name: Korruption (Rapha Saraiva)
description:
In this game I made:

Game design, art, sounds, music and UI.

Lore:

You are a powerful wizard that was designed to bring balance to the Forc.. world, with that in mind, you should defeat the evil, but without letting corruption grow in you. Luckily, there are some crystals cleanser around (:

How to play:

-To walk, press and hold the right button
-To attack, press and hold the left button

-The red sign shows the closest Enemy (Follow the red sign to get to the closest enemy)
-The blue sign shows the closest Crystal (Follow the blue sign to get to the closest crystal)

-Watch out for your corruption Level, if they get to high you die...
-Corruption grows as you kill enemies, so be careful
-Get crystals to lower your corruption level
